Localization.Name: Vanduul
Localization.Description: Military designations for the various Vanduul ship components.

English.Name: Vanduul
English.Description: Military designations for the various Vanduul ship components.

Localization.Name: 'WEAK' Repeater
Localization.Description:
Manufacturer: Vanduul / Esperia
Item Type: Laser Repeater
Size: 1

This laser repeater is typically found on Vanduul war ships and is commonly known by its UEE Navy designation of 'WEAK'.
